summary: A surreal period film following an university professor and his eerie nomad friend as they go through loose romantic triangles and face death in peculiar ways.
cast: Yoshio Harada|Naoko Ôtani|Kisako Makishi|Akaji Maro|Kirin Kiki|Yuki Kimura|Nagamasa Tamaki|Sumie Sasaki|Shiro Yumemura|Yuki Yonekura|Rubi Enoshima|Hikaru Benisawa|Tadaomi Watanabe|Takashi Aida|Yoshitomo Oda|Seiroku Nakazawa|Nobuko Uchiyama|Taeko Hori|Masami Ishii|Ryôko Kawahira|Hatsuo Yamaya|Hisato Aikura|Isao Tamagawa|Michiyo Yasuda|Toshiya Fujita
title: Tsigoineruwaizen
